ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // “Are you the one
who wants to be cute?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // “Yeah, I heard.
But it'll cost ya.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // “Urrrrgh!!!”{PAUSE}“Big Bro!! The only way
you're gonna get cuter is
if you can beat Big Bro!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:15}); // “So, you've got to
compete with us!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:16}); // “You're right.
Let's do squats.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:17}); // “All right!
We'll beat you
out of this gym!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:20}); // “What? You didn't know?
Always running around here
sayin' Big Bro' this,
Big Bro' that…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:21}); // “Never mind that,
come over here.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:22}); // “No, I'll explain the rules.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:23}); // “From the ready position,
push {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE} to squat,
push {PURPLE}[CANCEL]{WHITE} to get up, and
push {PURPLE}[OK]{WHITE} to go back
to the ready position.”{PAUSE}“So it's {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE},
{PURPLE}[CANCEL]{WHITE},
{PURPLE}[OK]{WHITE}
in that order.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:25}); // “Then I'll explain it again.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:26}); // “Whoever has the most squats
after 30 seconds gets the wig.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:27}); // “I'm not going to lose.”{PAUSE}“Big Bro's wig is MINE!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:32}); // “Now let's begin the real thing.
Start!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:33}); // “He had {MEM1} squats
and you had {MEM1} squats.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:37}); // “Since the old man from
the clothing store asked me,
I can't keep it from you, so…”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:38}); // “Oh, now where did I put it?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:41}); // “Stupid!
What kinda place is
that to hide it in!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:42}); // “Uuuuhh,
Bro's fists of
steel cut to the bone!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:43}); // “Sorry…you should still be able
to use it if you disinfect it first.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:45}); // “Good job.
Here's a hand-me-down.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:48}); // Received Key Item "Dyed Wig"!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:46}); // “Hey, Bro
I…I was supposed to get that.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:47}); // “Shut up!
You have no room to talk,
tying with a beginner like him!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:42}); // “Uuuuhh,
Bro's fists of
steel cut to the bone!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:49}); // “You're really something.
Okay, I'm a man of my word,
here you are.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:52}); // Received Key Item "Blonde Wig"!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:50}); // “Big Bro
I'm so mad
I'm so so so---mad!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:51}); // “Shut up!
Don't cry,
just because you lost!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:42}); // “Uuuuhh,
Bro's fists of
steel cut to the bone!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:42}); // “Uuuuhh,
Bro's fists of
steel cut to the bone!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // “All right…1, 2, 3.
Squats are all in the rhythm.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // “I'm doing my best,
bro'!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:55}); // “Big Bro…
Get a hold of yourself.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:55}); // “Big Bro…
Get a hold of yourself.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // “These days,
you've got to have strength.
Come on, you should work out.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // “More strength.”{PAUSE}“I bet you could climb all the way
up to the upper plate
if you used that pipe.”{PAUSE}“Don't you know?
The old man at the Weapon shop
can tell you more about it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // “Oh dear.
I've gained weight again.”

dialogStrings:
“More strength.”{PAUSE}“I bet you could climb all the way
up to the upper plate
if you used that pipe.”{PAUSE}“Don't you know?
The old man at the Weapon shop
can tell you more about it.”

“These days,
you've got to have strength.
Come on, you should work out.”

“All right…1, 2, 3.
Squats are all in the rhythm.”

“Are you the one
who wants to be cute?”

“Yeah, I heard.
But it'll cost ya.”

“Urrrrgh!!!”{PAUSE}“Big Bro!! The only way
you're gonna get cuter is
if you can beat Big Bro!!”

“So, you've got to
compete with us!”

“All right!
We'll beat you
out of this gym!”

“What? You didn't know?
Always running around here
sayin' Big Bro' this,
Big Bro' that…”

“From the ready position,
push {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE} to squat,
push {PURPLE}[CANCEL]{WHITE} to get up, and
push {PURPLE}[OK]{WHITE} to go back
to the ready position.”{PAUSE}“So it's {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE},
{PURPLE}[CANCEL]{WHITE},
{PURPLE}[OK]{WHITE}
in that order.”

“Whoever has the most squats
after 30 seconds gets the wig.”
“I'm not going to lose.”{PAUSE}“Big Bro's wig is MINE!!”

“It's not fair for you to start right away,
So, you want some practice?”
{CHOICE}A little
{CHOICE}Don't need to practice

“Now let's begin the real thing.
Start!”

“He had {MEM1} squats
and you had {MEM1} squats.”

“Since the old man from
the clothing store asked me,
I can't keep it from you, so…”
“Oh, now where did I put it?”

“Stupid!
What kinda place is
that to hide it in!?”

“Uuuuhh,
Bro's fists of
steel cut to the bone!”

“Sorry…you should still be able
to use it if you disinfect it first.”

“Hey, Bro
I…I was supposed to get that.”

“Shut up!
You have no room to talk,
tying with a beginner like him!!”

“You're really something.
Okay, I'm a man of my word,
here you are.”

“Big Bro
I'm so mad
I'm so so so---mad!”

“Shut up!
Don't cry,
just because you lost!”

“Big Bro…
Get a hold of yourself.”
